channel.title: Digital Humanities Questions & Answers » Topic: IS there a joint MLS MSIS/MA in English degree out there?
channel.description: Digital Humanities Questions & Answers » Topic: IS there a joint MLS MSIS/MA in English degree out there?

textInput.title: Search
textInput.description: Search all topics from these forums.
textInput.name: q

item.title: ejardine on "IS there a joint MLS MSIS/MA in English degree out there?"
item.dc:creator: ejardine
item.description: Long Island University's Palmer School has a joint Masters degree program with New York University in one of their graduate programs including English. More info at http://www.liu.edu/CWPost/Academics/Schools/CEIS/PSLIS/Graduate-Programs/Dual-Masters.aspx

item.title: allicrandell@gmail.com on "IS there a joint MLS MSIS/MA in English degree out there?"
item.dc:creator: allicrandell@gmail.com
item.description:
I have no affiliation with USC, but just know that the of University of South Carolina has a Digital Humanities Center and offers a joint MA (English)/MLIS -- perhaps this program is one to add to your list of contacts?

http://www.cas.sc.edu/engl/grad/ma-mlis.html

item.title: maureen.engel@gmail.com on "IS there a joint MLS MSIS/MA in English degree out there?"
item.dc:creator: maureen.engel@gmail.com
item.description:
We offer a joint MLIS/MA Humanities Computing

http://www.ois.ualberta.ca/nav03.cfm?nav03=103472&nav02=103471&nav01=61447

I'd be happy to provide more info.

item.title: Scott Weingart on "IS there a joint MLS MSIS/MA in English degree out there?"
item.dc:creator: Scott Weingart
item.description:
Indiana University has good one, although it's not necessary focused on DH.
http://www.slis.indiana.edu/degrees/joint/englishmls.html

item.title: Dorothea Salo on "IS there a joint MLS MSIS/MA in English degree out there?"
item.dc:creator: Dorothea Salo
item.description: I don't know of such a thing, but I can definitely see the possibilities. At UW-Madison we have a JD/MLS program and an infant music/MLS program; perhaps the latter might serve as a model?

item.title: tanyaclement on "IS there a joint MLS MSIS/MA in English degree out there?"
item.dc:creator: tanyaclement
item.description:
All,

We're thinking of starting a joint MLS or MIS/MA in English with a focus in DH at the UT iSchool. Do folks know of any examples out there?

thanks,
Tanya
